name: GUNRUN [Terry Brash]
description:
Kill lots of things. Like. A LOT.

GUNRUN is a twinstick survival roguelite with crazy enemy density, and even crazier weapons! Roam the crypts blasting holes through waves of undead, collecting resources to craft your perfect build, and discovering forgotten treasures!

How many enemies can you mow down in GUNRUN? Hundreds? Thousands? MORE?!

Key Features:

  • Endless waves. Survive for as long as possible!
  • Slay hundreds of thousands of enemies in a run!
  • Dash! Great for defense, and offense.
  • Deckbuilding!
  • Custom engine! Expect EXCELLENT performance on any computer!
